data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Controls the animation speed for the List Group.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Determines the border radius of the List Group items.

data.name: variant
data.description: Specifies the style variant of the List Group, either bordered or flat.

data.name: itemClasses
data.description: Additional classes to apply to each List Group item.

data.name: type
data.description: Defines the container type, either a <div> or <ul> element.

data.name: href
data.description: Specifies the URL if the List Group item should be rendered as a link.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Controls the animation speed for the List Group item.
